mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaolian_name as jiaolianName ,a.jiaolian_phone as jiaolianPhone ,a.jiaolian_photo as jiaolianPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.rongyu_content as rongyuContent ,a.jiaolian_content as jiaolianContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM jiaolian a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.jiaolian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianName},'%')
and a.jiaolian_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianPhone},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.rongyu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.rongyuContent},'%')
and a.jiaolian_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
